inclusion.label: not_met
inclusion.evidence: The patient first developed seizures at age 13...

inclusion.label: met
inclusion.evidence: He was maintained on Dilantin and phenobarbital. The patient went 20 years without another seizure.

inclusion.criterion: Ability to understand verbal and written instructions
inclusion.label: unknown

inclusion.criterion: History of drug or alcohol abuse
inclusion.label: not_met
inclusion.evidence: The patient had no further events during the hospital course and was back at his baseline at the time of discharge.

inclusion.criterion: Life expectancy < 1 year due to malignant disease
inclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.criterion: Acute symptomatic epileptic seizures within 2 weeks of acute illness
exclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.criterion: Increased liver enzymes or bilirubin ≥ 2-fold ULN
exclusion.label: unknown

notes: Patient has a history of severe intellectual disability, CHF, and epilepsy. He presented with facial twitching on the right and generalized shaking in his NH which required 20 mg valium to cease seizure activity.
